title: The Equestrian Vortex
description: This Santini giallo, Il Vortice Equestre (The Equestrian Vortex), is a disturbing tale of a coven of witches presiding under a riding academy.
starring: Peggy Ansell, Jocelyn Fuller, Gertrud Trepte, Slavna Jagodic, Zsuzsa Varro, Camilla Minniti, Iliaria Carnevale, Antonella Beraldi, Torsten Graupner
